maqras.text: Ara-raahamana, (dayamaya allaha)
teraemi siksa diche kora'ana
teraemi srsti karaiche manuha
teraemi taka bhasa sika'iche
Surya arau candra nirdharaita hicapa anuyayi arartana karae
arau trnalata arau brksadiye chajada karae
arau teraemi akasakhanaka samunnata karaiche arau sthapana karaiche tulacani
yate tomaloke jokha-makhata simalanghana nakaraa
Arau tomaloke n'yayasangatabharae ojana pratistha karaa arau ojanakrta bastu kama nidiba
Arau prthiraikhanaka te'om srsti jirara babe sthapana karaiche
ya’ta ache phala-mula arau khejura gacha, yara phala araranamukta
arau ache bakaliyukta dana arau sugandhiyukta phula
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraemi manuhaka srsti karaiche pani misraita sukana matira paraa yito poraa matira darae
arau teraemi jinaka srsti karaiche dhomraabihina agnisikhara paraa
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraemi du'i udayacala arau du'i astacalara pratipalaka
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
teraem du'i sagaraka prabahita karae, ubhaye paraspara milita haya
kintu sihamta ubhayara majata ache eta antaraala, yito sihamte atikrama karaiba noraarae
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
ubhaya sagarara paraa utpanna haya mukuta arau poraala
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
arau sagarata bicaranasila parbata sadrsa nauyanasamuha te'omrae'i (niyantranadhina)
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
bhuprsthata yi ache sakalo dhbansasila
arau abinasbara kerala tomara pratipalakara ceharaa, yijana mahimamaya, mahanubhara
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
akasamandala arau prthiraita yisakala ache, sakalorae te'omra ocarata praarthi, te'om pratito muhurttate gurautbapurna kamata niyojita
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
he manara arau jina! Ami anatipalame tomalokara (hicapa-nikaca grahanara) prati manonibesa karaima
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
he jina arau manara sampradaya! Akasamandala arau prthiraira sima yadi tomaloke atikrama karaiba paraa tente atikrama karaa, kintu tomaloke (allahara) saktibihina atikrama karaiba noraaraiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tomaloka ubhayara prati praerana karaa ha’ba agnisikha arau dhumrapunja, tetiya tomaloke pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
yidina akasa bidirna ha’ba se'idina i tejabarna golapara darae rana chalara raupa dharana karaiba
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
gatike se'idina manuhako tara aparaadha samparke sodha naha’ba arau jinako nahaya
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
aparaadhisakalara paraicaya poraa yaba sihamtara laksanara dbaraa, tara pichata sihamtara agaculi arau bharaita dharai tani niya ha’ba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
e'itorae'i se'i jahannama, yaka aparaadhisakale asbikara karaichila
Sihamta jahannamara ju'i arau utala panira majata ghurai thakiba
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
arau yiye tara pratipalakara sanmukhata upasthita horaara bhaya posana karae, tara babe ache duta jannata
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
ubhaye'i bahu phala sakhabisista
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
Ubhaya jannatata ache prabahamana duta nijaraa
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
ubhayara majata ache pratyeka phala du'i du'i prakara
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tata sihamte a'uji bahiba enekuraa bichanata yara abhyantarabhaga ha'ba sinkhaperae tairai sukomala; arau ubhaya jannatara phala-mula thakiba nikatararti
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tata thakiba sbamira prati drsti simitakarai raupahisakala, yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
sihamta yeniba hiraa arau mukuta
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
uttama kamara pratidana uttamara bahirae arau ki ha’ba parae
eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
arau se'i duta jannatara bahirae'o arau duta jannata ache
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
jannata duta haiche ghana se'i'ujiya
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
e'i duta jannatata ache ucchalita duta nijaraa
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
tata ache phala-mula, khejura arau dalima
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
se'i jannatasamuhara majata ache caraitrararti, raupahi ramani
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
camiyanaborata suraksita hai thakiba hurasakala
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
Yisakalaka itipurbe kono manuhe athaba kono jine sparsa karaa na'i
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
sihamte a'uji bahiba se'i'ujiya dalicha arau dhuniya sinkhapara gadiyukta asanata
Eteke tomaloka ubhaye tomalokara pratipalakara konato anugraha asbikara karaiba
barakatamaya tomara pratipalakara nama, yijana mahamahima arau mahanubhara
